name: tm08
effect: Teaches Bulk Up to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Bulk Up to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Rock Smash Gen I: Body Slam)

flavor_text.black-white: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.
